entry.data:
CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS

CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 80
